         Nobody answered. Annabeth just lay on the floor screaming her lungs out, but no one came to her aid. She just cried and cried until she had tired herself out, acting just like one would expect from an infant.

         She only stopped when she realized that her situation had just gotten a great deal worse - her diaper was no longer empty. She could feel it on her butt. She had just done something she hadn't done since she was a toddler; she'd pooped in a diaper. With this horrifying thought in mind, Annabeth shook her fists in the air, kicked her legs furiously, and cried harder than ever, hoping someone come to help.

         She sniffled miserably. She had never felt so helpless in her life.

154332211222112122211211211212.content:
Thanks to her unintentional wish, Piper found herself diapered, dressed like a bouncing little toddler, and getting her wet diaper changed by her boyfriend Jason, who obviously had no memory of their adventures together. Instead, he was of the firm mind that Piper was just a baby who needed her new princess diapers. Given what had just happened, Piper couldn’t argue.

She was left wondering how a simple joke of a wish had landed her here, getting a diaper change, but she knew things were wrong. Jason’s hands were going all over the right places, but she wasn’t feeling any of the teenage tingle that she was supposed to feel. Now that she swelled on it a little bit, she was wondering just why she was supposed to feel anything at all.

What was so special about that part of her?

...what was that part of her even called again?

Try as she might, but Piper was having a harder and harder time remembering some things, like what numbers came after ten, and what the full alphabet was.

Jason lifted her legs up and slid one of the gigantic baby diapers under her, and Piper put her thumb to her mouth, beginning to furiously suck on it as she tried to remember shapes and colors. The sound of Jason undoing one of the tapes rang like thunder in her ear, and the sound of the second tape all but blasted her mind to unrecoverable pieces.

Well, not really. In time, it would all come back to her, but right now was the time for her wish to be granted in full, in that she no longer had to worry about having to get up and go to the toilet, because now she was wearing her toilet.

“There we go,” Jason chirped, giving Piper’s diaper a pat. “All nice and clean.”

And then, in the typical fashion of a true baby, Piper’s butt let out a loud fart, and the seat of her diaper instantly expanded. Piper giggled profusely as Jadon pinched his nose with a bemused expression.

“Seriously? You couldn’t have done that in your other diaper?”

Piper blurbled unintelligibly.

“Well, I put plenty of powder and lotion on you, so you’ll be fine until your dad gets home. Let’s get your stinky little butt in your crib. Time for your nap.”

At the mention of “nap,” Piper immediately flopped over and closed her eyes. Jason just picked her up with a smile, carried her through the house, and set her down in her crib, mashing the mess in her diaper.

“Sleep tight, kiddo. I’ll wake you in a few hours.”

Piper put her hand in her mouth, and drifted off into the first of many naps in her new toilet-free lifestyle.

Luckily, a package of diapers had appeared next to Piper after she regressed, so Jason was able to change her into one. Once that was completed, he lifted her up and placed her in the corner, where she crawled around and played, completely unashamed by the diaper that was plainly showing. A bunch of baby toys appeared in that corner, so this place was really starting to look like the home of a baby girl.

         At this same time, Percy laid two-year-old Annabeth down on the floor, lifted her legs into the air, and removed her diaper. Though being a bit older than Piper, Annabeth was making his task a little more difficult, since she kept trying to crawl away. Because of this, Percy had to call Jason over to help him keep her still.

         "Stop it, Annie," he said, feeling the childish nickname fitting given her new age. "I need to change around. You can't just go around sitting in a poopy diaper, now, can you? Nor can you go around without a diaper."

         Annabeth started to cry, but Jason was effective in holding her down. Percy managed to wipe her clean. Then picking up a bottle of baby lotion, he rubbed on her bottom. And finally he lifted her up and had a new diaper placed around her waist.

         "There we go," he said. "Now that wasn't too bad, was it?"

         "Yes, it was," said Annabeth, in a voice that sounded very childish, but she didn't seem to notice.

         Percy chuckled, for it was difficult to resist given how cute the little girl was. He picked up the little two-year-old and placed her down next to Piper, still crawling around on the floor.

         "There," he said. "Now why don't you play with little Piper while Jason and I talk over here."

15433221122211212221221112221.content:
Instead of looking at her in disgust, Jason was instead looking at her with amusement, and not the “LoL, you just peed yourself,” kind of amusement, but the kind that adults displayed when a child lived up to their negative expectations.

Piper got a weird feeling go up her spine. Jason shouldn’t be looking at her like he was an adult proven right in the face of some petulant child, he should’ve been up on his feet, asking her if she was alright and needed help or medicine. She had just peed her pants!

The sour smell was already wafting into her nose, so Jason was probably smelling it too.

“Alright,” the son of Jupiter said tiredly, like her wetting her pants was a normal occasion and he was tired of dealing with it. “Let’s go get those wet pants off and get you into a dry diaper.”

“A diaper!?” Piper gasped. “Jason, wha—? It was an accident! I don’t need a diaper, I just need to get changed.”

“Mm-hm,” Jason said, unimpressed as he grabbed her arm and began leading her down the hall. “Just an accident—just like it was accident this morning, just like four times yesterday, and just like it was accident two days ago when you pooped yourself, despite each time you just stood up and went in your pants without even taking two steps to the potty? Sorry, Pipes, but these aren’t accidents. You’re just too immature to use the toilet which is why you’re back in kindergarten, and I’m kinda tired of doing your laundry, so, diapers.”

Piper could offer no retort as she was absolutely floored by what Jason had just said. Multiple accidents? She pooped herself? Too immature to use the toilet? Kindergarten? Just what was going on here?

Deciding to play along in the hopes of gaining more information about whatever situation she found herself in, Piper let Jason do his do. He led her to the bathroom and got down on a knee, making Piper’s heart flutter thinking this was all just an elaborate prank and he was about to propose, but no. Instead, he unbuttoned and unzipped her jeans.

“Hey!” Piper cried.

“Hush up,” Jason ordered, batting her hands away. “Unless you want me to leave you in these wet pants?”

Piper bit her lip and Jason resumed. With a swift yank, Piper’s jeans were at her ankles, and she gasped at what she saw.

On the way to the bathroom, her underwear had felt weird, but she had chalked it up to the fact that they were soaked in pee. It had been so long since she had last peed her pants, she had forgotten what wet panties felt like. Now, with her jeans off, it was revealed she wasn’t wearing panties at all.

At least, technically speaking.

Piper’s underwear consisted of training panties, not to be confused with pull-ups, which were just diapers with a different style of tape on the side. No, training panties were these 100% cotton pants that were styled exactly like underwear, but had a thick wad of material in the crotch for accidents. Obviously, not very absorbent, which was why they went best with plastic panties.

Which Piper was also wearing, and had managed to leak through.

“One foot,” Jason said. “Other foot.”

Following his commands like the little girl she apparently was now, Piper was left in the nude from the waist down. Jason lifted the toilet seat and gently pushed her down onto it.

“If you’ve got anything left in you, now’s the time to push it out. I’ll be right back.”

Jason exited the bathroom, leaving the door open and Piper by herself on the potty with her wet jeans, training panties, and plastic panties on the floor a ways from her feet.

Swallowing, still in a little bit of shock from all that had suddenly happened since she made the joke about wishing to not have to worry about the bathroom, Piper relaxed her muscles. To her surprise, she actually pushed out some poop, a full load, actually, and that scared her.

That much she should’ve felt. Her bowels should’ve alerted her that they were full and ready for the toilet. Still, given that she had already gone pee-pee in her pants, and apparently had several accidents in the past few days, Piper was glad that she was going poo-poo in the potty instead of in her training panties.

...

A record scratch went off in Piper’s head. Had she just thought of the words pee-pee...and poo-poo...and HER training panties?

She didn’t get to dwell on these things because Jason returned with a skirt in one hand, and a Hello Kitty-themed Pampers Easy-Up, big enough to fit a teenager like Piper.

“I figured that if you could manage to poop in the potty instead of your pants like last time, that warranted at least a pull-up...unless you want me to get you a diaper?” Jason teased.

Piper shook her head vigorously. “The...ah,” gods was she really about to say this? “The pull-up is fine, Jason.”

“Gotcha. You done, or do you have a little bit more?”

“I’m done.”

“Are you sure? I’m letting you wear a pull-up instead of a diaper, so I’d better not have to change you anytime soon.”

“I’m done going poo-poo, Jason.” Piper said tersely, and she felt her blood stop for a second when she realized she had said “poo-poo” again.

“Alright. Up you go then. Time to wipe that nasty butt of yours.”

“What—wait!”

Piper got no chance to defend herself. Jason had her by the arm again, lifting her off the toilet, his other hand having opened the little Disney Princess-themed box on top of the toilet that contained wet wipes. Now, Piper had passing thoughts about doing butt stuff with her boyfriend, but him wiping her butt after she had just gone poo-poo?

No sir.

She squirmed when the cool wipe made contact with her backside, and she squirmed harder when Jason’s fingers brushed past her hole. It was rince and repeat until Jason seemed her clean enough, and he flushed, treating Piper to the nasty site of the dirty wipes getting tossed in a circle along with her waste until it all vanished down the drain. To her embarrassment, there was a streak of poop left on the side of the toilet bowl.

“Alright, one foot,” Jason said.

Blushing, Piper put one foot into the Easy-Up’s leg hole, then the other, and then Jason gently slid them up into place around her hips, and did the same with the skirt. A stretchy denim number, with a picture of Hello Kitty on the side.

“There,” Jason said. “All dry, and your skirt matches your undies. What do you say?”

“Th-Thank you...?”

Just then, they heard the front door open and then get firmly shut.

“Piper, Jason, I’m home!”

The demigoddess paled considerably at the sound of her father’s voice.

“Let’s go say hi to your Daddy,” Jason said pleasantly.

Grabbing her arm, he led her through the rest of the house, and Piper’s heart started beating in her chest. Rounding the corner, there was Mr. McLean, setting down his things on the kitchen table.

“There’s my little princess!” He crowed. “Jason, was she a good girl today?”

1543322121111.content:
Initially freaked out over this whole ordeal, Annabeth took a breath and focused in, attacking her situation with the same tactics she always used: a sly still.

This was not the first time she had pooped in her diaper, i.e. when she was a baby and when she was potty training; beck, this wasn’t even the first time She had pooped herself since those days. She had a poopy accident when on the run with Luke and Thalia, and she had pooped her pants several times here at camp, mostly due to pranks, but there was that time when she literally had the crap knocked out of her during a CTF game.

Clarisse used to tease her about that until Annabeth wedgied her and strung her up on a tree.

Remembering those times brought comfort to Annabeth, and boosted her confidence in her current situation. In all those times, everything had turned out fine, and this situation, while certainly unique, would be no different.

She dropped her shorts to inspect the damage, and noted how the diaper had been sized up along with her body, being a perfect fit for her teen figure. The mess inside the diaper was also teen-sized, based on how much skin felt like it was covered in muck. Annabeth looked around, hoping to see something along the lines of changing supplies, but no such luck.

Mentally buckling down, Annabeth left this place and headed straight to the Big House where Chiron was going to be. He could help. Fortunately, no campers or other attendees of camp stopped her on her way, so she didn’t have to explain the poopy smell that was following her. Though she already had the lie of she stepped in something ready to go if need be.

Annabeth gently knocked on the farmhouse door and entered. Mr. D was gone, leaving only the old centaur in his magic wheelchair. His eyed lit up at seeing her.

“Ah, Annabeth! What bring you...” chiron’s nose wrinkled. “Young lady, have you pooped in your pants again?”

“Funny story about that,” Annabeth laughed, and told her mentor all about her recent adventure.

Chiron sighed when she was done. “Go take a shower upstairs. I’ll have clothes out in the room across the hall, and I’ll make some calls to make sure there won’t be any unexpected funny business. Just throw your diaper in the trash. I’ll take care of it.”

“Thanks, Chiron.”

Though a bit miffed at the “your diaper” comment, Annabeth did as she was told. Making it to the bathroom, she undressed and gingerly I taped the diaper, her nose wrinkling as the full brunt of the smell hit her. She was glad Percy wasn’t here right now, else the poor boy would be totally stunned that his beautiful girlfriend could produce something that smelled so foul.

Annabeth filled the diaper up and taped it together like she had seen on beaches, and tossed it. Then she turned the water on and waited for it to get warm before stepping in and cleaning the remaining poop from her butt. She was disgusted by how the water browned at her feet, but there was nothing she could do about that. She grabbed the soap and really got a good clean, and because she was in the shower and not in a diaper anymore, she released her bladder.

Yeah, she peed in the shower, so what?

After she was nice and clean again, she turned The water off, grabbed the towel, dried herself and wrapped herself, and made her way across the hall, where there was a set of clothes in her size on the bed.

Shirt, shorts, socks, shoes, bra, and panties.

All without the nasty poop smell stuck to the fabric.

Annabeth got dressed and went back downstairs, where Chiron was waiting for her.

“I talked to some people, and you should be completely fine. I sense no other magic around you aside from your own, but all the same: watch you eat, when you eat it, and what you do after. Take frequent bathroom breaks, and perhaps set a few alarms for the night. I debated setting out a pull-up instead of panties, but I went with an optimistic approach.”

“Thanks, Chiron, for everything.”

“You’re welcome, dear.”

They hugged in their special father-daughter way, and Annabeth made her leave.

As she went on her way, she reflected on all that happened and found the whole experience to be...not totally unpleasant. Sure, being turned into a baby sucked, and she could’ve done without the poopy diaper, but the diaper itself...

Snug, comfy, soft, and it made her butt look even more awesome than it usually did.

Feeling tingly in a certain place about her lower body, Annabeth decided that she needed to do some exploring about the padded world she had been introduced to.

15433222111.content:
As she felt her bottom, Annabeth realized she must be wearing a pair of pull-up training pants, but at least they were clean now. It had been uncomfortable sitting in that messy diaper. She was too concerned about this one, at least not more than she was that she had to be five years old again - after all, she had still worn pull-ups the last time she was five.

         What does she do now?
15433222111.title: pull-ups

154332221111.content: How does she act like a child?
154332221111.title: She starts acting more like a child.

15433222112.content:
Annabeth smiled. She might be a little girl again, but at least she wasn't a baby in diapers. There was at least one thing she had control over. But she needed help. She was five years old again. She had never felt so helpless.

         How does she handle this situation?
15433222112.title: underwear

choices: She finds a box of toys and begins playing on the ground, seemingly unconcerned.
154332221121.title: childishly

choices: "As soon as someone changes you out of this one, yes."
"No. Until you are aged back to seventeen, you will not be potty trained."
1543322212.content:
Upon the will of her mother Athena, Annabeth suddenly shot up in height. Before long, she became recognizable as the girl - albeit still younger - she used to be.
         Looking down at herself, Annabeth realized she hadn't lost her baby fat, so she had to be fairly young. Furthermore, she was dressed in pink Princess Aurora pajamas, made for a little girl, and her curly blond hair was now tied up in pigtails. As she moved over to the mirror, she was forced to waddle due to the diaper still wrapped around her tiny legs, and also due to the discomfort that it was not clean. She still needed her diaper changed.
         "What?" she whined, starting to cry like a real little girl. "I'm five years old now. I'm not a baby. How can I still be in diapers?"
         A light shined in front of her, as he mother Athena appeared before her.
         "I'm sorry, my girl," she said. "I fought for you. But unfortunately Hebe can be very petty and quite vengeful. Lord Zeus has decreed that until further notice, you will have to live as a kindergartener."
         "But, Mommy," Annabeth complained, frowning at her own word choice. "Why am I still in diapers?"
         Athena's nose wrinkled as if just noticing the stench. "Oh, dear," she said. "You must have had a little accident before we aged you up. We didn't account for that. That would be why, my dear. Our magic couldn't get rid of the diaper while it was still messy."
         "Will I be getting out of diapers, then?" Annabeth asked hopefully.
         What is Athena's reply?
1543322212.title: No, she is still wearing a poopy diaper.

15433222121.content:
Athena inclined her head. "As soon as someone changes you out of this one, yes. However, as a goddess, this is work beneath my stature. You will have to find someone else to change you."
         Annabeth looked away, as her mother assumed her true divine form as she vanished.
         How does Annabeth get out of the diaper?
15433222121.title: Good News

choices: She just pulls her pants back up.
A new undergarment appears before her, sent by the gods.
154332221211.content:
Annabeth still has her teenage mind. She can change her own diaper. Waddling over into a corner, Annabeth removed her pants, and then undid the straps on her disposable diaper. Tossing it aside, she took out some wipes and carefully wiped herself clean.

         "There," she said happily when it was done, blushing at how childish her voice sounded.

         Now that she has been cleaned up, what does she do now?
154332221211.title: She cleans herself up.

choices: She whistles for Blackjack, who flies her to Camp Half-Blood.
She runs into her friends as she is running away. They had been looking for her.
1543322212111.content:
Unsure what else to do, Annabeth simply shrugged and pulled her pants back up. Then she ran out of the temple, wanting to get as far from this place as possible. Besides, she wanted to find her friends again.

         What does she do?
1543322212111.title: She just pulls her pants back up.

choices: Yes, they have become five, too.
They're not exactly five, but they have all joined her as little kids.

15433222121112.title: She runs into her friends as she is running awa...

choices: Embrace their new childhood and act their ages.
Run away before they're enrolled in kindergarten
154332221211121.content:
As Annabeth was running out of the temple, she ran into a group of eight kindergarteners; however, at her new age she was now eye level with them. It didn't take her long to recognize them as younger versions of her friends: Percy, Grover, Jason, Thalia, Frank, Hazel, Reyna, and Nico. It took them slightly longer to recognize her.

         Upon accepting that they were indeed all five-year-olds again, what do they do?
154332221211121.title: Yes, they have become five, too.

choices: Percy and Annabeth are the only ones who remember being older.
Everyone who is currently at least a toddler doesn't remember being older.
154332221211122.content:
Annabeth ran into her friends -- Percy, Grover, Frank, Hazel, Jason, Reyna, Nico, and Thalia -- but there was something odd about them. Like her, they had turned into little kids. Percy had joined her as a five-year-old. However, many of them were even younger or still older. Grover was two. Nico and Frank were babies. Hazel was eight. Jason was six. Reyna was nine, and Thalia was four.

         It was bizarre; they were even dressed differently. Percy were a smaller version of his orange Camp Half-Blood T-shirt; Grover did as well, only now his goat hindquarters were covered by a disposable diaper. Nico's dark clothing was replaced with a green Elmo T-shirt and a plain white disposable diaper; meanwhile, Frank's purple T-shirt had been placed with a purple onesie with a bulge, a telltale sign of his diaper. Both infants were barefoot and crawled around on the ground. Hazel wore a red T-shirt and a light blue skirt. Barefoot as well, she bent down and was playing with her now baby brother. Reyna's black hair was tied up in pigtails, and she now wore a blue Frozen T-shirt and a light pink skirt.

         As weird as that was, the most shocking thing were the Graces. The ordinary goth Thalia wore a frilly pink dress which only barely covered the Disney Princess pull-up she wore underneath, and her dark hair was tied in pigtails. Holding her hand was six-year-old Jason, dressed in a green Little Mermaid T-shirt and jeans. Not to mention, from the way she was acting Thalia seemed to believe she always had been a four-year-old preschooler; she truly began to sound like Jason's bratty little sister.

         Besides Thalia, who else believes their ages are normal?
154332221211122.title: They're not exactly five, but they have all...

choices: A pair of little girl's panties, Frozen-themed
1543322212112.content: As Annabeth was about to pull her pants back up, something appeared before her that could replace the diaper. What is it?
1543322212112.title: Pull-ups or Underwear

"No," her mother said sadly. "Until you are aged back to seventeen, you will not be potty trained. That is part of the deal. You will have to find someone to take care of you."

         Annabeth looked up at her. "Can you do it? You're my mommy."

         Athena shook her head. "I am afraid not, my daughter. I am an immortal. It is for mortals to care for our demigod children. That is how it has been deemed for centuries." Her facial expression softened slightly. "I'll tell you what I will do, however. Give me a name of who you would like your caregiver to be, and I shall send you there."

         What name does Annabeth give?

choices: Someone from Camp Half-Blood or Jupiter
15522122112.content:
Thalia groaned as her bones seemingly caved in on themselves, and she gasped in pain, closing her eyes for a moment. But that moment was the one in which she should have kept her eyes open. Not even a second after she shut her eyes, the black haired female began to shrink down.
She opened her eyes and gasped with shock. Everything was...much bigger than she remembered it! Then Thalia heard the sound of footsteps, and could only watch as someone walked in.
15522122112.title: She's shrunken down!

155221221121.content:
Artemis herself walked in, apparently looking for Thalia. "My lady," Thalia called. "Look on the bed!" As if by magic (which Thalia did not doubt-being a Hunter of Artemis also meant that everyone got enhanced hearing, including Artemis herself), Artemis looked at the bed, seeing Thalia's shrunken form.

"Thalia, what happened?" The goddess asked.

"I don't know. All I know is that I was in pain, closed my eyes for a moment, and then I'm like this," Thalia answered. Artemis, out of concern (and maybe some motherly love), gently picked Thalia up. Then, her stomach, even though the Olympians didn't need to really eat food, rumbled. Thalia looked at her, and nodded, laying her head down.

Artemis considered the 'pros'. No one would be able to find Thalia, and she would be comfortable, plus, Artemis would be full until whatever happened wore off. On the other hand, it would leave her Hunt without a Lieutenant for a little while. Gently, she licked Thalia's feet, and almost moaned at the flavour, her half sister (their father is Zeus, remember? So that means that Apollo is also her half brother) tasted delicious!

But now Artemis came to a thought: which way to eat Thalia? Headfirst or feet first?
155221221121.title: It's Artemis!

1552212211211.content:
Well...she didn't want her Lieutenant to potentially get brain damage from this, so Artemis gently put Thalia's feet into her mouth, gently pushing Thalia in a moment later. Thalia smiled, and began to squirm a moment later. Artemis moaned, her mouth full of Thalia, but she reluctantly swallowed a moment later, tracing Thalia's path into her belly.
"Are you okay in there Thalia?" She asked worriedly.

"Yeah!" Thalia laughed, "it's quite comfortable in here, but...look my lady, please don't send anyone in yet. It's really nice and cozy in here, and I just...I like it for some odd reason. It's like it's my personal place." Artemis smiled, and gently poked her belly. Thalia definitely felt nice in there.

"Thalia, thanks for...saying that. If this doesn't get reversed anytime soon, I'll talk to Hecate, see what she can do. In the meantime Thalia," she trailed off.

"What is it my lady?" Thalia asked.

"The Hunters don't know about this yet, so how do we hide it?" Artemis asked, and Thalia was silent for a moment.

"Well," she said after a moment, "we can always make it seem like I needed a bit of a break from the Hunt and informed you about it beforehand, so maybe we can hide it that way."

Artemis smiled. "That sounds like a good idea," the Olympian said, rubbing her stomach again.
1552212211211.title: Feetfirst!

info.brief_description: Do anything to the females from Percy Jackson. *UPDATED DESCRIPTION! MUST READ!*
info.description:
So, I decided to return to some of my older stories that don't get much attention. Sure, my stuff doesn't get much attention anyway, but this gets close to nothing. Main reason, too many option chapters.

So, here's a couple of updated rules for anyone thinking of adding to this story. Not sure why you'd add, but of you do, take heed.
1) If you want to add an option chapter, you had better add something meaningful after it.
2) If you decide to add a proper chapter that advances the story, make sure it's, at the very least, readable. By that, I mean grammar. Capital letters, punctuation, all that stuff you learn in school.
3) The expanding female cannot die. If she does, it had better be some sort of dream, or it gets deleted.
4) Absolutely no male expansion.
5) Other females can feature, and expand. I just can't be bothered reworking the entire story to accommodate this.

And that's it for rules. If you decide to read, have fun. If you decide to add a chapter, cheers.
